 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיק‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==make empty, empty out== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***pour out, forth***, intransitive (of water, blood, etc.); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רִיק‎</span> ***empty, pour***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in derivatives; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rê‡u***</u></abbr>, ***empty***); — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲרִי֫קֹתִי‎</span>[[Lev.26.33|Lev 26:33]]; [[Mal.3.10|Mal 3:10]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵרִיקוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.28.7|Ezek 28:7]]; [[Ezek.30.11|Ezek 30:11]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִיק‎</span> [[Hab.1.17|Hab 1:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫רֶק‎</span> [[Gen.14.14|Gen 14:14]] (but see below); ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרֵק‎</span> [[Ps.35.8|Ps 35:8]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרִיק‎</span> [[Isa.32.6|Isa 32:6]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיקִים‎</span> [[Gen.42.35|Gen 42:35]]; [[Zech.4.12|Zech 4:12]] — 

**1.** ***empty*** vessels [[Gen.42.35|Gen 42:35]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Jer.48.12|Jer 48:12]] ***keep empty***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְחֶרִיק נֶפֶשׁ רָעֵב‎</span> [[Isa.32.6|Isa 32:6]] (i.e. keep hungry). 

**2.** ***pour out*** or ***down***, rain [[Mal.3.10|Mal 3:10]]; [[Eccl.11.3|Eccl 11:3]], oil [[Zech.4.12|Zech 4:12]]. 

**3.** ***empty out*** (i.e. ***draw***) sword (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kakkê ittabbaku***</u></abbr> [passive], [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 699 b</sup>) [[Exod.15.9|Exod 15:9]] (poem), [[Lev.26.33|Lev 26:33]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Ezek.5.2|Ezek 5:2]]; [[Ezek.5.12|Ezek 5:12]]; [[Ezek.12.14|Ezek 12:14]]; [[Ezek.28.7|Ezek 28:7]]; [[Ezek.30.11|Ezek 30:11]] probably also [[Hab.1.17|Hab 1:17]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרבו‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרמוֺ‎</span> [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); of lance [[Ps.35.3|Ps 35:3]] compare (several.) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וירק חניכיו‎</span> [[Gen.14.14|Gen 14:14]] ([[BDB#R|R]]) ***led forth***, &lt; Samaritan <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫דֶק‎</span> (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דּוּק‎</span> Aph\`el ***look***) i.e. ***mustered*** [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויפקּד‎</span> Ball. — In [[Ps.18.43|Ps 18:43]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲדִקֵּם‎</span>; so \|\| [[2Sam.22.43|2Sam 22:43]] MT; but [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרִיקֵם‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דקק‎</span>). **Hoph\`al** ***be emptied out*** from vessel : ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּרק‎</span> [[Jer.48.11|Jer 48:11]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוּרַק‎</span> [[Song.1.3|Song 1:3]] (al. 3 feminine singular; of ointment, in simile); compare also [[Amos.6.6|Amos 6:6]], where [[BDB#Oort|Oort]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּרְקֵּי‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִזְרְקֵי‎</span>.
